channel.title: 317,pi,itemDEF
channel.description: [code]if(i == 15603) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Equip"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 11112; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11112; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11112; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 400; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Beautiful Cape"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A Beautiful Cape For Beautiful People.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }[/code] can some1 rename em into itemDEF?

item.title: 317,pi,itemDEF
item.dc:creator: @Ineverbow Ineverbow
item.description:
@Ineverbow wrote:

if(i == 15603) { class8.aStringArray189 = new String[5]; class8.aStringArray189[1] = "Equip"; // String name, this can be changed to wield, or attach, or whatever you want class8.anInt174 = 11112; // Drop/Inv Model class8.anInt165 = 11112; // Male Wield Model class8.anInt200 = 11112; // Female Wield class8.anInt188 = -1; // Male arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt164 = -1; // Female arms/sleeves (Leave as -1 if not used) class8.anInt181 = 400; // Zoom - Increase to make inv model smaller class8.anInt190 = 498; // Rotate up/down - Increase to rotate upwards class8.anInt198 = 1300; // Rotate right/left - Increase to rotate right class8.anInt169 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move right class8.anInt194 = -1; // Position in inv, increase to move up class8.aString170 = "Beautiful Cape"; // Item Name class8.aByteArray178 = "A Beautiful Cape For Beautiful People.".getBytes(); // Item Examine }
can some1 rename em into itemDEF?
